params._gameType: The `GameType` to set as the respected game type.

blacklistDisputeGame(address,address).notice: Calls the Security Council Safe's `execTransactionFromModuleReturnData()`, with the arguments      necessary to call `blacklistDisputeGame()` on the `OptimismPortal2` contract.      Only the deputy guardian can call this function.

deputyGuardian().notice: Getter function for the deputy guardian's address

pause().notice: Calls the Security Council Safe's `execTransactionFromModuleReturnData()`, with the arguments      necessary to call `pause()` on the `SuperchainConfig` contract.      Only the deputy guardian can call this function.

safe().notice: Getter function for the Safe contract instance

setRespectedGameType(address,uint32).notice: Calls the Security Council Safe's `execTransactionFromModuleReturnData()`, with the arguments      necessary to call `setRespectedGameType()` on the `OptimismPortal2` contract.      Only the deputy guardian can call this function.

superchainConfig().notice: Getter function for the SuperchainConfig's address

unpause().notice: Calls the Security Council Safe's `execTransactionFromModuleReturnData()`, with the arguments      necessary to call `unpause()` on the `SuperchainConfig` contract.      Only the deputy guardian can call this function.

blacklistDisputeGame(address,address).notice: Calls the Security Council Safe's `execTransactionFromModuleReturnData()`, with the arguments      necessary to call `blacklistDisputeGame()` on the `OptimismPortal2` contract.      Only the deputy guardian can call this function.

deputyGuardian().notice: Getter function for the deputy guardian's address

pause().notice: Calls the Security Council Safe's `execTransactionFromModuleReturnData()`, with the arguments      necessary to call `pause()` on the `SuperchainConfig` contract.      Only the deputy guardian can call this function.

safe().notice: Getter function for the Safe contract instance

setRespectedGameType(address,uint32).notice: Calls the Security Council Safe's `execTransactionFromModuleReturnData()`, with the arguments      necessary to call `setRespectedGameType()` on the `OptimismPortal2` contract.      Only the deputy guardian can call this function.

superchainConfig().notice: Getter function for the SuperchainConfig's address

unpause().notice: Calls the Security Council Safe's `execTransactionFromModuleReturnData()`, with the arguments      necessary to call `unpause()` on the `SuperchainConfig` contract.      Only the deputy guardian can call this function.

DisputeGameBlacklisted(address).notice: Emitted when a DisputeGame is blacklisted

Paused(string).notice: Emitted when the SuperchainConfig is paused

RespectedGameTypeSet(uint32,uint64).notice: Emitted when the respected game type is set

Unpaused().notice: Emitted when the SuperchainConfig is unpaused

ExecutionFailed(string).notice: Error message for failed transaction execution

userdoc.notice: This module is intended to be enabled on the Security Council Safe, which will own the Guardian role in the         SuperchainConfig contract. The DeputyGuardianModule should allow a Deputy Guardian to administer any of the         actions that the Guardian is authorized to take. The security council can revoke the Deputy Guardian's         authorization at any time by disabling this module.

params._gameType: The `GameType` to set as the respected game type.

documentation.text: @notice Error message for failed transaction execution
@notice Emitted when the SuperchainConfig is paused
@notice Emitted when the SuperchainConfig is unpaused
@notice Emitted when a DisputeGame is blacklisted
@notice Emitted when the respected game type is set

@notice Getter function for the Safe contract instance
 @return safe_ The Safe contract instance

@notice Getter function for the SuperchainConfig's address
 @return superchainConfig_ The SuperchainConfig's address

@notice Getter function for the deputy guardian's address
 @return deputyGuardian_ The deputy guardian's address
@notice Internal function to ensure that only the deputy guardian can call certain functions.

function (address,uint256,bytes memory,enum Enum.Operation) external returns (bool,bytes memory)
